statements: UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 1000.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET from_address = 'Alice', to_address = 'Bob' WHERE block_id = 10;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 1000.50, to_address = 'xyz@example.com' WHERE transaction_id = 12345 AND block_id = 54321;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET from_address = 'abc@example.com', amount = 500.75 WHERE transaction_id = 54321 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 10.5, to_address = 'address123' WHERE transaction_id = '1234-5678-9012-3456';
UPDATE block_metadata SET num_transactions = 15, block_timestamp = '2022-01-20 12:00:00' WHERE block_hash = '8765-4321-0987-6543';
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 500.00, timestamp = '2022-01-30 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE block_metadata SET miner_address = '0x9f7c013157cfe2e4157b97d465195b6496af01', num_transactions = 15, block_timestamp = '2022-02-05 15:45:00' WHERE block_number = 1001;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 500.25 WHERE transaction_id = '1a2b3c4d5e';
UPDATE transaction_logs SET log_description = 'Updated log description' WHERE log_id = '6f7g8h9i0j';
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = amount + 100, timestamp = NOW() WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transaction_metadata SET gas_fee = 0.005, block_time = '2022-01-01 00:00:00' WHERE transaction_id = '98765432-1234-aaaa-bbbb-ccccccccdddd';
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET sender_address = 'wallet123' WHERE transaction_id = '04b52a1b-1c07-4f4e-b9c4-0d3ddc748abe';
UPDATE block_info SET miner_address = 'miner456', transaction_count = 10 WHERE block_id = 101;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET receiver_address = '1234567890' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transaction_details SET transaction_amount = 1000.00, transaction_fee = 50.00 WHERE transaction_id = '98765432-1b2a-3c4d-5e6f-987654321000';
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET sender_address='0x123456789', recipient_address='0x987654321' WHERE transaction_id=1;
UPDATE addresses SET balance=1000.00 WHERE address_id=2;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = amount * 1.1 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE addresses SET balance = balance - 100.50 WHERE address = '0x1234abcd';
